# Matchbox Website Project Instructions

This is a React + TypeScript project for Matchbox's website built with Vite for fast development and modern tooling.

## Project Structure
- `/src/pages/` - Page components (Home, About, etc.)
- `/src/components/` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/layouts/` - Layout components for page structure
- `/src/hooks/` - Custom React hooks
- `/src/utils/` - Utility functions and helpers
- `/src/types/` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/assets/` - Static assets (images, fonts, etc.)
- `/src/styles/` - Global styles and CSS modules

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with TypeScript
- Implement proper component composition
- Follow React best practices for state management
- Use CSS modules or styled-components for styling
- Maintain consistent file naming conventions
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Vite (build tool)
- React Router (routing)
- Modern CSS or styled-components
